testcase.name: WeatherControllerSpec english locale temperature when parameter "degrees" is passed when degrees is below zero returns below zero text
WeatherControllerSpec english locale temperature when parameter "degrees" is passed when degrees is above zero returns above zero text
WeatherControllerSpec english locale temperature when parameter "degrees" is passed when degrees is zero returns above zero text
WeatherControllerSpec english locale temperature when parameter "degrees" is not passed returns 422
WeatherControllerSpec english locale clouds when parameter "clouds" is passed when clouds percentage is more than 70 returns "Cloudy"
WeatherControllerSpec english locale clouds when parameter "clouds" is passed when clouds percentage is less or equal than 70 returns "Partially cloudy"
WeatherControllerSpec english locale clouds when parameter "clouds" is passed when clouds percentage is less or equal than 10 returns "Clear weather"
WeatherControllerSpec english locale clouds when parameter "clouds" is not passed returns 422
WeatherControllerSpec english locale wind when parameter "wind_speed" is not passed returns 422
WeatherControllerSpec english locale wind when parameter "wind_speed" is passed when wind speed is less than 3 returns "No wind"
WeatherControllerSpec english locale wind when parameter "wind_speed" is passed when wind speed is less than 20 returns "Windy"
WeatherControllerSpec english locale wind when parameter "wind_speed" is passed when wind speed is less than 8 returns "Light breeze"
WeatherControllerSpec english locale wind when parameter "wind_speed" is passed when wind speed is more or equal than 20 returns "Very strong wind"
WeatherControllerSpec when no locale is set clouds returns response in English
WeatherControllerSpec when no locale is set temperature returns response in English
WeatherControllerSpec when no locale is set wind returns response in English
WeatherControllerSpec spanish locale clouds when parameter "clouds" is passed when clouds percentage is less or equal than 70 returns "Partially cloudy" in Spanish
WeatherControllerSpec spanish locale clouds when parameter "clouds" is passed when clouds percentage is more than 70 returns "Cloudy" in Spanish
WeatherControllerSpec spanish locale clouds when parameter "clouds" is passed when clouds percentage is less or equal than 10 returns "Clear weather" in Spanish
WeatherControllerSpec spanish locale temperature when parameter "degrees" is passed when degrees is zero returns above zero text in Spanish
WeatherControllerSpec spanish locale temperature when parameter "degrees" is passed when degrees is above zero returns above zero text in Spanish
WeatherControllerSpec spanish locale temperature when parameter "degrees" is passed when degrees is below zero returns below zero text in Spanish
WeatherControllerSpec spanish locale wind when parameter "wind_speed" is passed when wind speed is less than 3 returns "No wind" in Spanish
WeatherControllerSpec spanish locale wind when parameter "wind_speed" is passed when wind speed is less than 20 returns "Windy" in Spanish
WeatherControllerSpec spanish locale wind when parameter "wind_speed" is passed when wind speed is less than 8 returns "Light breeze" in Spanish
WeatherControllerSpec spanish locale wind when parameter "wind_speed" is passed when wind speed is more or equal than 20 returns "Very strong wind" in Spanish
